mediaBlock.heading: Hello World.
mediaBlock.description: My name is Ian Frost. I am a meteorologist turned web designer. I make awesome websites and design systems with great people to make companies better.

tileSection.headline: Projects
tileSection.description: From small companies to large enterprises, I create web experiences both by myself and through collaboration with colleagues.

tileSection.headline: Blog
tileSection.description: From weather to web design to life, I share my knowledge with the world through writing.

tileSection.headline: About
tileSection.description: Learn more about me or feel free to contact me.
